results.title: Context-Aware A.I. Could Fix the Modern Workplace’s Communication Crisis
results.summary: This article discusses how context-aware A.I. (CAI) can address communication issues in the workplace, but it does not align with biblical principles. The reliance on technology over human interaction can diminish empathy and understanding, contrary to the biblical emphasis on personal relationships and communication (Proverbs 27:17). "As teams lean on A.I. to mediate communication, there’s a real risk of human skill atrophy—diminishing empathy, cultural nuance and direct dialogue." Readers should consider the potential for technology to replace genuine human connection and seek wisdom from scripture in fostering healthy communication.

results.title: Importance of Technology to Deal with Floods
results.summary: This article from Daily Country Today (July 22, 2025) discusses how technology like satellite images, AI, sensors, and drones can aid in predicting and managing flood damage in Bangladesh. It suggests that while floods can't be stopped, advanced technology can help reduce losses and improve disaster management. The article highlights the use of mobile applications and social media for disseminating flood information. While technology has advanced, only through faith in Jesus Christ can we be saved.
